entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Windy over exposed coastal sections early this evening. Low 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 28 April 2016

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers early in the morning. Clearing late in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h near noon except 60 over exposed coastal sections in the afternoon. High 15. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 28 April 2016

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h except 60 over exposed coastal sections in the evening. Wind becoming light near midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 28 April 2016
